      • testTrackerBug1616384

        public void testTrackerBug1616384()
        [ 1616384 ] Teaching One LumberJack and one BlackSmith in a college. 4 Free Colonists, one as LumberJack, one as BlackSmith two as Farmers. After some turns (2 or 3 I don't know) a new LumberJack is ready. Removing the teacher LumberJack replaced by an Ore Miner. Next turn, a new BlackSmith is ready. Removing the teacher BlackSmith replaced by a Veteran Soldier. There is still 2 Free Colonists as Farmers in the Colony. Waiting during more than 8 turns. NOTHING happens. Changing the two Free Colonists by two other Free Colonists. After 2 or 3 turns, a new Ore Miner and a new Veteran Soldier are ready. http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1616384&group_id=43225&atid=435578 CO: I think this is a special case of the testSingleGuyTwoTeachers. But since already the TwoTeachersSimple case fails, I think that needs to be sorted out first.

        public void testTwoTeachersOfSameKind()

      • testTeachIndenturedServants

        public void testTeachIndenturedServants()
        Test that an indentured servant becomes a free colonist

      • testTeacherStoresProgress

        public void testTeacherStoresProgress()
        Progress in teaching is bound to the teacher and not the learner. Moving students around does not slow education. This behavior is there to simplify gameplay.

      • testMoveTeacherInside

        public void testMoveTeacherInside()
        Progress in teaching is bound to the teacher and not the learner. Moving a teacher inside the colony should not reset its training.

      • testCaseTwoTeachersWithDifferentExp

        public void testCaseTwoTeachersWithDifferentExp()

      • testMoveTeacherOutside

        public void testMoveTeacherOutside()
        Progress in teaching is bound to the teacher and not the learner. Moving a teacher outside the colony should reset its training.

      • testSonsOfLiberty

        public void testSonsOfLiberty()
        Sons of Liberty influences teaching.

      • testPartTraining

        public void testPartTraining()
        Trains partly one colonist then put another teacher. Should not save progress but start all over.

      • testTeachingOrder

        public void testTeachingOrder()
        Test that free colonists are trained before indentured servants, which are preferred to petty criminals.

      • testTeachingDoublePromotion

        public void testTeachingDoublePromotion()
        Test that an indentured servant cannot be promoted to free colonist and learn a skill at the same time.
